reviews.text: I stepped off the train at the Koblenz station and walked a few yards to the local tourist office. I was ready with a couple of hotel ideas that I had gathered but, the woman at the office suggested I look at the Triered. I was only in town for the night and this fit the bill. It's a smaller (maybe 30 rooms) located in Old Town Koblenz.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel in Old Town Koblenz

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I had a single room on the 3rd floor. While small, it had everything I needed for a one night stay. I don't think they have air conditioning but, the fan in the room kept it very comfortable. For dinner, you're only a few steps away from a dozen or more lovely little restaurants.
reviews.title: We loved the Hotel Trierer Hof
